title: Creamsicle Murder
description: *This is book 11 in the Frosted Love Cozy Mystery Series*   A stolen cupcake and a dead co-star lead Missy and Chas into a mystery big enough for the silver screen. Only the cupcake will point in the right direction and you'll never guess which of the production company's employees poisoned it before time almost runs out for Missy and Chas. Lights, Camera, Murder! author: Carol Durand
